data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, At Red Bull Arena, Miami are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Miami at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 4, Tim Ford signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Maximiliano Urruti of Montreal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Samuel Piette of Montreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Goal! Bojan Krkic gives Montreal a 1-0 lead.
Montreal needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Montreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Miami push upfield but Tim Ford quickly pulls them for offside.
Tim Ford signals a Miami throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 14, Montreal's Romell Quioto gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Amar Sejdic (Montreal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Montreal are coming forward and Romell Quioto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Miami at Red Bull Arena.
Important block from the Miami defence as Romell Quioto fires in a strike for Montreal.
Montreal's Bojan Krkic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 18, Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Maximiliano Urruti for Montreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 22, Miami have a goal kick.
Tim Ford awards Montreal a goal kick.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Miami.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Goal! Miami go level at 1-1 through Brek Shea in Harrison.
Great play from Leandro Gonzalez Pirez to set up the goal.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
In the minute 38, Miami drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Tim Ford signals a throw-in for Montreal, close to Miami's area.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Miami are whistled for offside.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Miami are caught offside.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Montreal.
In the minute 45, Bojan Krkic (Montreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half has ended.
Ben Sweat (Miami) has received a yellow card from Tim Ford.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Tim Ford signals a Miami throw-in in Montreal's half.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 48, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Montreal pushes forward through Romell Quioto, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
In the minute 52, Montreal drives forward and Samuel Piette gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Harrison Montreal drive forward through Maximiliano Urruti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
In the minute 53, Montreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Miami are pushing forward but Dylan Nealis's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In the minute 56, Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tim Ford signals a Montreal throw-in in Miami's half.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Miami to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 64, Miami's Blaise Matuidi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montreal defender.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Miami will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Montreal.
In the minute 68, Montreal surge into the attack at Red Bull Arena but Rudy Camachoâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Miami at Red Bull Arena.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Montreal just outside Miami's area.
In the minute 69, Miami's Leandro Gonzalez Pirez has been booked in Harrison.
Montreal push forward at Red Bull Arena and Rudy Camacho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Miami defence.
Throw-in for Montreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Tim Ford signals a free kick to Miami.
Diego Alonso is making the team's first substitution at Red Bull Arena with Julian Carranza replacing Wil Trapp.
Lewis Morgan for Miami drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Miami.
Gonzalo Higuain of Miami smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tim Ford signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Montreal's area.
In the minute 76, Montreal needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Miami's Dylan Nealis gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Montreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Miami at Red Bull Arena.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Tim Ford awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Gonzalo Higuain gets his shot on target but fails to score for Miami.
Maximiliano Urruti scores to make it 2-1 at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 80, That's a fine assist from Bojan Krkic.
Miami's Gonzalo Higuain is on target but unsuccessful.
Blaise Matuidi (Miami) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 83, Miami's Matias Pellegrini breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Federico Higuain is replacing Victor Ulloa for Miami at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 83, Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a third substitution, with Matias Pellegrini replacing Dylan Nealis.
Montreal's Romell Quioto misses with an attempt on goal.
Tim Ford awards Miami a goal kick.
Miami to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
In the minute 85, Montreal make their first substitution with Shamit Shome replacing Bojan Krkic.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Montreal.
Tim Ford signals a Miami throw-in in Montreal's half.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Tim Ford signals a Miami throw-in in Montreal's half.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Miami have a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Miami to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Miami are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Harrison, Federico Higuain of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Ballou Tabla is replacing Maximiliano Urruti for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Joel Waterman (Montreal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
